CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 29, 1955, pg. 9, reads: "Serious Painting - During his summer recess from the Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts at Philadelphia, Ray Saunders painted this serious portrait of John McElroy, of 2 Gazzam Street, for whom he has a high respect. The portrait was completed after early morning painting session, as Saunders drives for perfection. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Raymond "Ray" Saunders, painting portrait of John McElroy, outdoors
